content.webTitle: Picks of the week: Scotland & Ireland: Classical and opera

fields.headline: Picks of the week: Scotland & Ireland: Classical and opera
fields.bodyText: The Merry Widow High School, Plockton, Saturday; Nevis Centre, Fort William, Tuesday; Albert Halls, Stirling, Thursday Scottish Opera's sparky touring production, directed and choreographed by Clare Whistler. Irish Chamber Orchestra National Concert Hall, Dublin, Sunday Soprano Susan Gritton is the soloist in a Bach cantata, Anthony Marwood directs from the violin. Three Illusions Music Hall, Aberdeen, Friday Ilan Volkov and the BBC Scottish Symphony Orchestra preface Beethoven's Ninth with Elliott Carter's exquisite miniatures. Falstaff National Concert Hall, Dublin, Thursday Not Verdi's masterpiece but a concert performance, the first for 170 years, of Michael Balfe's Shakespearean comedy.
